articles.description: Kimberley Eccles, 23, from Leyland, Lancashire, was told by doctors she had Rhabdomyosarcoma, a rare tissue cancer, over a Zoom call in August after three appointments were cancelled due to Covid.
articles.content:
A care worker who had three vital medical appoointments cancelled due to Covid was told by doctors she had cancer over Zoom. 
Kimberley Eccles's aggressive cancer has now spread and the mum-of-one h… [+8617 chars]
